description.es: Contiene una clasificación de formaciones vegetales de Venezuela. Para mayor información, se puede consultar el Libro Rojo de los Ecosistemas Terrestres de Venezuela, 2010.
description.en: Contains a classification of vegetation units in Venezuela. For additional information, see the Red Book of Venezuelan Terrestrial Ecosystems, 2010.

tileInfo: {"type":"vector","displayAttribute":"T_VE","style":{"type":"fill","paint":{"fill-opacity":0.5,"fill-outline-color":"#000","fill-color":{"type":"categorical","property":"T_VE","default":"#707070","stops":[["Bosques siempreverdes per se","#1f743a"],["Bosques nublados","#6cbd45"],["Bosques de palmas","#75b374"],["Bosques de pantano","#5fbb46"],["Bosques de manglares","#5b8a45"],["Bosques semideciduos","#7bc46c"],["Bosques deciduos","#b0d136"],["Bosques ribereños","#aaab37"],["Arbustales siempreverdes per se","#cba865"],["Arbustales tepuyanos","#a83b23"],["Arbustales espinosos","#f2633e"],["Arbustales litorales","#f8a67f"],["Arbustales ribereños","#a77129"],["Arbustales y herbazales parameros","#e6b620"],["Sabanas abiertas","#ffd27f"],["Sabanas arbustivas y/o arboladas","#fca91c"],["Herbazales de pantano","#d5e9b9"],["Herbazales arbustivos sobre arena","#cfe188"],["Herbazales tepuyanos","#fbeabd"],["Herbazales litorales","#f7f175"],["Áreas intervenidas","#DCDCDC"]]}},"id":"formaciones_vegetales_2010_v2","source":"formaciones_vegetales_2010_v2","source-layer":"formaciones_vegetales_2010_v2"}}
